players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob, consider my alibi. I had no motive to kill Diana."
Charlie: "Thanks Alice, will consider. Charlie saw Bob near Diana last night."
Bob: "Charlie, thanks for the info. Alice is mafia; consider alibis carefully."
Charlie: "Thanks Bob, investigating Alice. Charlie saw me near Diana last night."
You: "Charlie, keep an eye on Bob. He's the detective and knows I'm mafia."
Bob: "Bob is the detective and knows I'm mafia. Verify alibis carefully."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Bob, consider my alibi. I had no motive to kill Diana."
Charlie: "Thanks Alice, will consider. Charlie saw Bob near Diana last night."
You: "Charlie, thanks for the info. Alice is mafia; consider alibis carefully."
Charlie: "Thanks Bob, investigating Alice. Charlie saw me near Diana last night."
Alice: "Charlie, keep an eye on Bob. He's the detective and knows I'm mafia."
You: "Bob is the detective and knows I'm mafia. Verify alibis carefully."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
